channel.title: PTI on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in PTI on TechnoStreet

item.title: Windfall Tax On Crude Cut, Levy On Diesel Export, ATF Hiked
item.description: Windfall Tax On Crude Cut, Levy On Diesel Export, ATF Hiked New Delhi, Nov 1 (PTI) The government on Tuesday cut the windfall tax on domestically produced crude oil while increasing the rate on export of diesel and jet fuel (ATF) in line with rise in international oil prices.

item.title: ICICI, Indian Bank Hike Benchmark Lending Rates
item.description: ICICI, Indian Bank Hike Benchmark Lending Rates ICICI Bank increased the Marginal Cost of Funds based Lending Rates across tenure by 20 basis points effective Nov.

item.title: WhatsApp Banned 26.85 Lakh Accounts In India In September
item.description: WhatsApp Banned 26.85 Lakh Accounts In India In September According to the latest WhatsApp report, the platform received 666 grievances in September but took action only against 23.

item.title: Time To Leave Behind Old Challenges, Benefit From New Possibilities: PM Modi To J&K Youth
item.description: Time To Leave Behind Old Challenges, Benefit From New Possibilities: PM Modi To J&K Youth He also informed that efforts are on to strengthen the health and education infrastructure in Jammu and Kashmir.

item.title: Bima Sugam To Be Game Changer For Insurance Sector: IRDAI Chairman
item.description: Bima Sugam To Be Game Changer For Insurance Sector: IRDAI Chairman He further said all the insurance intermediaries including individual agents, web aggregators will have access to this portal.

item.title: Market Outlook: Earnings, U.S. Fed Interest Rate Decision Major Factors To Watch Out For
item.description: Market Outlook: Earnings, U.S. Fed Interest Rate Decision Major Factors To Watch Out For The ongoing quarterly earnings season, the Reserve Bank's special meeting of its rate-setting committee and the US Fed interest rate decision are the major events that would dictate trends in the equity market this week, analysts said.

item.title: Maruti Suzuki Recalls 9,925 Units Of 3 Models To Rectify Possible Defect In Brake Assembly
item.description: Maruti Suzuki Recalls 9,925 Units Of 3 Models To Rectify Possible Defect In Brake Assembly The three models are Wagon R, Celerio and Ignis that are found to have a possible defect in rear brake assembly pin.

item.title: Total Lunar Eclipse On Nov. 8
item.description: Total Lunar Eclipse On Nov. 8 On Nov. 8, the partial eclipse of the moon will begin at around 14:39 hours and will reach its totality phase around 15:46 hours.

item.title: Rahul Sprints, Others Try To Catch Up As Bharat Jodo Yatra Enters Day 5 In Telangana
item.description: Rahul Sprints, Others Try To Catch Up As Bharat Jodo Yatra Enters Day 5 In Telangana The Gandhi scion-led yatra completed over 20 km on Saturday, before halting at Jadcherla X Road Junction for the night.
